{{disambig-more|Brandir|[[Brandir (disambiguation)]]}} {{infobox character | people=[[Edain|Adan]] | name=Brandir | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location= | affiliation= | language= | birth={{FA|409}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Bëor]] | parentage=[[Arachon]] and [[Bregil]] | siblings=[[Beldis]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Brandir''' was a man of the [[House of Bëor]]. == History == Brandir was the elder child of [[Arachon]] and [[Bregil]]. His younger sister [[Beldis]] married [[Handir]] of [[Brethil]] and their child, known as [[Brandir|Brandir the Lame]], was named after his uncle.{{WJ|14}}, ''(i) House of Bëor'', p. 231 ==Etymology== The name ''Brandir'' is said to be a compound of ''[[brand (word)#Exilic Noldorin|brand]]'' + ''[[dîr]]'', meaning "Noble Man".{{LR|Etymologies}}, pp. 351, 354 (entries for [[BARAT#Other versions of the legendarium|BARÁD]] and [[DER]]) ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | | | | | | | | | | | BOR | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | |BOR=[[Boromir (Lord of Ladros)|Boromir]]
